Rob Churchill
Publications Research Teaching Industry About

Teaching

Throughout my time as a graduate student, I was a teaching assistant many times. Between 2016 and 2021, I was a TA for Data Science (Fall 2016, Fall 2019, Fall 2021), and Databases (Spring 2016, Spring 2018). I also helped teach at Georgetown University Women Coders events from 2016 to 2021.

I love teaching and am looking forward to getting back to teaching at some point in my career!

rjc111@georgetown.edu

Rob Churchill has a Ph.D. in Computer Science from Georgetown University. His dissertation topic was Modernizing Topic Models Accounting for Noise, Time, and Domain Knowledge.
